title: NVIDIA Corp. stock rises Monday, outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       rose 3.60% to $852.37 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.12% to 5,130.95 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.25% to 38,989.83. This was the stock's third consecutive day of gains. NVIDIA Corp. hit a new 52-week high, surpassing its previous peak of $823.94, which the company reached on February 23rd. Trading volume (60.5 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 47.6 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The S&P 500 is up almost 50% since October 2022.
